content.text:
# List of Latin American Academy Award winners and nominees

This is a list of Latin American Academy Award winners and nominees by category. Each list details the performances of Latin American-born filmmakers, actors, actresses and films that have either been nominated for or won an Academy Award. This list is current as of the 97th Academy Awards ceremony held on March 2, 2025.
Best Picture
